title: Median Calculator
description:
Given an array of integers, write a function `median` that calculates the median of the array. The median is the middle value in an ordered integer list. If the length of the array is even, return the average of the two middle values.

#### Function Signature
```python
def median(nums: list[int]) -> float:
```

#### Input
- `nums` (list[int]): A list of integers.

#### Output
- Returns the median of the input list as a floating-point number.
